```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(kableExtra)
library(effsize)
library(broom)
library(ggbeeswarm)
```

```{r}
water <- read_csv("HW2_Water.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = water,
       aes(x = Abatement,
           y = MC_Agriculture)) +
  geom_point(aes(x = Abatement,
                 y = MC_Agriculture), 
             color = "skyblue3", 
             size = 2) + 
  geom_smooth(aes(x = Abatement,
                  y = MC_Agriculture),
              method = "lm", 
              se = FALSE, 
              color = "skyblue3") + 
  ggpubr::stat_regline_equation(label.x = 77, label.y = 1250) + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Abatement,
                 y = MC_Meat),
             color = "orange", 
             size = 2) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x = Abatement,
                  y = MC_Meat),
              method = "lm", 
              se = FALSE, 
              color = "orange") + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Abatement,
                 y = MC_Industrial),
             color = "violetred",
             size = 2) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x = Abatement,
                  y = MC_Industrial),
              method = "lm", 
              se = FALSE, 
              color = "violetred") + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Abatement,
                 y = MC_Urban),
             color = "purple",
             size = 2) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x = Abatement,
                  y = MC_Urban),
              method = "lm", 
              se = FALSE, 
              color = "purple") +  
  labs(x = "\nReduced Water Use (Acre Feet)", 
       y = "Marginal Abatement Cost ($/Acre Foot)\n") +
  theme_bw() 

```

```{r}

ggplot(data = ca_groundwater) +
  geom_line(aes(x = year,
                y = inflow),
            color = "skyblue3",
            size = 1.5) +
  geom_line(aes(x = year,
                y = outflow),
            color = "orange",
            size = 1.5) +
  labs(x = "\nYear",
       y = bquote ("Groundwater Flow (" ~ 10^9 ~ m^3 ~")"),
       title = "Annual Mass Balance Model of California Groundwater from 2000-2050\n") +
  theme_bw() +
  annotate("text", 
           x = 2010, 
           y = 23, 
           label= "y = 0.176x - 333.8") +
  annotate("text", 
           x = 2010, 
           y = 14, 
           label= "y = -0.05x + 112.8") +
  annotate("text", 
           x = 2010, 
           y = 24, 
           label= "outflow") +
  annotate("text", 
           x = 2010, 
           y = 15, 
           label= "inflow") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", 
                                  size = 12))
```
